title: Bug 19660Preference page does not expand to fit all widgets
description: We've only been able to reproduce this problemon LinuxGTK, where it happens quite frequently.
OB: Bug 19660Preference page does not expand to fit all widgets Build 20020607LinuxGTKThe preference page dialog often does not expand enough to fully displayall the widgets it contains. Just opening thepreference page and clicking through on various pages, you're pretty muchguaranteed to see the problem.Since the platform UI code seems to work as expected on other platforms, itlooks like either the GTK widget isn't growing as much as the UI isrequesting or the widgets aren't reporting their true required size.
